entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView in ShellFlyoutContent inverts item layout direction in WinUI #16483
  • [iOS] SearchBar Cancel button and searching for an empty string does not trigger the SearchCommand #16480
  • Animation CallBack action not invoked when enabled the battery-saver in Android device. #16478
  • FadeTo not completing on Samsung devices with visibility enhancement "Remove animations" turned on #16476
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] [Windows] `WidthRequest="0"` in `Grid` crashes the app #16475
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add DataPackageOperation.Move option for Drag & Drop #16472
  • Shell tab bar overflows the content of the page when navigating back through swipe [iOS] #16471
  • Maui migrating Xamarin to Maui - Tabbed Page Scroll Issue - Tabs are not scrolling #16470
  • XAML can't find outer converter and fails to build #16468
  • Appended ToolbarHandler mapper action not called on iOS #16467
  • XAML Schemas Namespace Customization Not Supported Without 'x:Name' Declaration #16466
  • When I use MVVN binding a property , and use a thread to update this property value. This property value has been changed in the code,but in UI not changed! #16465
  • MaximumHeightRequest property of ScrollView is incorrect on Android. #16464

Closed

  • Colors correct on simulator but incorrect on device #16482
  • Invalid URI: The Uri string is too long. - NET MAUI #16434
    Backlog
  • ContentPage gradient issue on iOS/MacCatalyst #15128
    Under Consideration
  • .NET 8 Preview 6 Android crashes with System.MissingMethodException #16166
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow * rows/columns treated as Auto to expand during 2nd measure pass #16488
  • Fix BlazorWebView tests on Windows #16487
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [SourceGen] Support genric types from XML namespaces #16486
    area/Xaml </>
  • [testing] Make test by default on 16.4 #16479
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [uitests] Skip a couple of more Compatibility UITests #16477
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump the androidx group with 1 update #16474
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #16473
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 8.0-preview7

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Add latest versions to bug template #16484
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, Task
  • Reinstate IContentView and ILayout methods #16411
    area/layout 🔲, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue setting ContentPage gradient background #15832
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • [net8.0] Make UpdateBackground public #16453
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • [build] Remove the old step for vs insertion on release #16457
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Locate MAUI VIew for PlatformView #16463
  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265
    area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SearchBar #16383
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • Document Element #16299
    area/docs 📓, .NET 8
  • Implement Additional PointerGestureRecognizer Platform Arguments #16426
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [WinUI] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16213
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Essentials] add WiFi permissions on Android 13+ #14718
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks #16078
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Add `dotnet-local` scripts to make using in tree dotnet easier. #16461
  • [iOS] Add updates for LineHeight, TextDecorations, CharacterSpacing #16223
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview7] Fix EntryCellRenderer to use FromHandler for text changes #16462
  • Remove Debug and Release Entitlements plists and Replace with Custom Entitlements #16355
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Setting binding on Label doesn't set text to incoming binding #16410
    .NET 8 GA
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
